name: Brewmaster
title: Mangix
lore: Deep in the Wailing Mountains lived a monk master of the brewing arts. Mangix was his finest disciple.

thunderClap.name: Thunder Clap
thunderClap.description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing enemies in an area.

cinderBrew.name: Cinder Brew
cinderBrew.description: Drenches enemies in alcohol, slowing them and causing fire to ignite them for bonus damage.

drunkenBrawler.name: Drunken Brawler
drunkenBrawler.description: Grants a chance to dodge attacks or deal critical damage. Cycles between offense and defense.

primalSplit.name: Primal Split
primalSplit.description: Splits into three elemental warriors - Earth, Storm, and Fire - each with unique abilities.
